name: LogFileHighlighter
description: Adds color highlighting to log files to make it easier to follow the flow of log events and identify problems.

commands.title: Log File Highlighter: Remove Progress Indicator Decorations

items.title: Custom patterns to highlight.
items.description: A custom pattern that is highlighted with the given foreground color.

pattern.title: The pattern that will be highlighted.
pattern.description: Either the exact string to highlight, or a regular expression pattern.

patternFlags.title: Optional extra RegExp flags
patternFlags.description: By default, the 'gm' flags are automatically used for all custom pattern in Log File Highlighter. This setting allows you to extend those flags. Example: 'i' for case-insensitive matching or 's' for making '.' match newline characters.

foreground.title: Foreground color
foreground.description: The foreground color that will be used for highlighting.

background.title: Background color
background.description: The background color that will be used for highlighting.

highlightEntireLine.title: Highlight Entire Line
highlightEntireLine.description: If true, then the entire line is highlighted and not just the pattern.

borderRadius.title: CSS border radius
borderRadius.description: Border radius, defines how rounded a border is. Example: '3px'

letterSpacing.title: CSS letter spacing
letterSpacing.description: Letter spacing, can be used for adjusting the horizontal distance between characters of the matched text. Example: '3px'

overviewColor.title: Marker color in the ruler
overviewColor.description: Marker color in the ruler to the right in the text editor window. Example: 'yellow'

overviewRulerLane.title: Placement of the ruler marker
overviewRulerLane.description: Allows for configuring the placement of the ruler marker, if 'overviewColor' is set. Allowed values: Example: 'Left', 'Right', 'Center', 'Full'

textDecoration.title: CSS text decoration
textDecoration.description: Adds additional decorations to matched text. Example: 'underline overline dotted red'

logFileHighlighter.customPatterns.title: Custom highlighting patterns.
logFileHighlighter.customPatterns.description: An array of custom patterns that shall be highlighted.

logFileHighlighter.enableProgressIndicat.description: Enable or disable the progress indicator for selected lines

logFileHighlighter.progressIndicatorUnde.description: The color to use for drawing the timestamp progress indicator underline

logFileHighlighter.enableTailMode.description: Enable or disable the tail mode in log files. Scroll to the end of a file to activate it. The status bar will show 'Log File Tail Mode' when it is active.
